review: Great for when you travel and there is nothing on tv worth watching.
author: David Garcia

review: You're going to Netflix and chill so hard with the Fire TV stick they're going to call you Val Kilmer. The Fire TV stick is the "Everybody Loves Raymond" of wifi-only streamers; the streamer you know you want, but you wouldn't want to tell everyone you enjoy it (though you can hide it literally anywhere on the TV with the HDMI extender). I own a Chromecast as well, and I have to say Fire TV is a serious contender. My only complaint: at the time of writing this review, there is no YouTube app (at least I was shocked by this).
author: Mark A Zavala

review: easy to set up, under 5 min. Went right to amazon prime and netflick as advertised with no problem
author: william mullen

review: in the description of the item , it is not specified which does not work OUTSIDE THE USA.en la descripción del artículo, no se especifica que no trabajan fuera de EE.UU.NO FUNCIONA FUERA DE USA basura

review: My favorite niece gave me the fire stick as a birthday gift and it took me forever to connect it to my TV.  I'm somewhat technologically challenged.  What an amazing device.  I love that I can watch Netflix and listen to music on my phone.  I'm still figuring out all the possibilities.
author: chiweb

review: Awesome tool on television you can't beat it!
